compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Many business expenses related to workers completing their job will be tax exempt. Only purely business related elements of this expense will be tax free, anything additional will be subject to tax

Passenger cars PLN 0.89 per kilometer with an engine capacity of up to 900 cm3 or PLN 1.15 per kilometer with an engine capacity above 900 cm3. For tax-deductible purposes: PLN 0.5214 per kilometre for engine capacity up to 900 cm3 or PLN 0.8358 per kilometre for engine capacity exceeding 900 cm3. Expenses over the limit constitute revenue for the employee

Domestic travel: The current rate is 45 PLN per day. Duration of Trip up to 8 hours = 0%, between 8 – 12 hours 50%, More than 12 hours 100%. It is possible to increase the daily per diem rate. However, any portion of the per diem amount that exceeds the set Government rate will be taxable
Domestic travel: When meals are provided free of charge to the employee the meal allowance is reduced by Breakfast 25%, Lunch 50%, Dinner 25%

International travel: Duration up to 8 hours = 1/3 of allowance, between 8 and 12 hours: 50%, more than 12 hours = 100%. When meals are provided free of charge the meal allowance is reduced by: Breakfast – 15%, lunch – 30% and dinner 30%. Any portion that exceeds the set Government rate will be taxable

Domestic accommodation: amount for an overnight stay cannot exceed 20 times the amount of the allowance (PLN 900). If accommodation not provided and no bill submitted, entitled to lump-sum payment of 150% of the allowance

International accommodation: reimbursement up to limits set in regulations for each country. If no bill provided, entitled to lump-sum payment of 25% of the limit. Higher costs may be reimbursed in justified cases, but surplus over limit constitutes revenue for employee

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Equipment, Taxi, Training, Mileage
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Receipts and invoices must be submitted with expenses. Online copies are sufficient. Documents must be actual tax receipts or invoices; booking confirmations will not suffice

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Equipment, Taxi, Training, Mileage
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Only invoices that are hard copies are needed to be sent to GoGlobal in Warsaw. Invoices made electronically are accepted and there is no need to provide hard copies

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Equipment, Taxi, Training, Mileage
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Any personal information not required for reimbursement purposes should be removed before it is submitted

For mileage, a log book will need to be submitted. Must include: start/end (date and time), reason from travel, location and approval. This has to be documented in the vehicle mileage log kept by the employee
For Per diems, a log book will need to be submitted. Must include: start/end (date and time), reason from travel, location and approval

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Equipment, Taxi, Training, Mileage
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Expenses need to be submitted within 4 months
For general reimbursement as per receipts no specific form is required
Any costs outside of the per diem should be submitted as expenses against receipts and invoices
Per diem is not mandatory to use, and you can choose to give based on actual receipts to the worker. Any travel policy should be agreed upon prior to the worker starting
No receipts or invoices need to be provided when using the per diem method
Expenses that fall outside of per diem can be reimbursed as expense reimbursements against receipts however will be taxed
For international travel, employee must receive advance payment before departure. After return, employee must settle travel within 14 days with supporting documents
If a document (bill, invoice, ticket) could not be submitted, the employee must submit a written declaration stating the expense incurred and the reasons why it was not documented
